summary: Tournament platform with admin management. Features include full admin editing of all tournament fields at any time, manual Room ID & Password entry by admins, configurable visibility window (admin sets how many minutes before start time Room ID/Password are revealed to players), and auto-reveal logic for Room ID/Password.

existing_features.title: Replace the TournamentManagementPanel's tournament creation-only form with a full tournament management UI that lists all existing tournaments and provides an Edit button for each. The edit form must include all tournament fields: name, date/time, prize pool, game type, max players, Room ID, Room Password, and a numeric field for visibility window (minutes before start). The form must submit updates via the updateTournament backend call.

Add a React Query hook (useUpdateTournament) in useTournamentQueries.ts that calls the updateTournament backend function and invalidates the tournament list and individual tournament queries on success.

In the TournamentDetailPage, implement auto-reveal logic for Room ID and Password: compare the current time against (tournament start time minus roomVisibilityMinutes). If the current time is within the visibility window AND the user is a registered participant of that tournament, display the Room ID and Room Password. Outside the window, show a countdown indicating when credentials will be revealed. If the user is not registered, do not show credentials at all.

new_feature_requests.summary: Full admin editing of all tournament fields (name, date/time, prize pool, game type, max players, Room ID, Password, visibility window, etc.) at any time after creation
Manual Room ID and Password entry by admins on tournament edit page, updatable anytime
Configurable visibility window: admin sets how many minutes before tournament start the Room ID and Password become visible to registered players
Auto-reveal logic: Room ID and Password automatically appear to players once the configured countdown window is reached

Extend the tournament data model in the backend to include the following new fields: roomId (Text), roomPassword (Text), and roomVisibilityMinutes (Nat â€” number of minutes before start time when room credentials become visible to players). All fields should be optional at creation and updatable at any time.

Add an updateTournament backend function that allows admins to edit all tournament fields including name, date/time, prize pool, game type, max players, roomId, roomPassword, and roomVisibilityMinutes. The function must enforce admin-only access and accept a partial or full update record.
Update the migration module to handle the new roomId, roomPassword, and roomVisibilityMinutes fields on existing tournament records, defaulting them to empty strings and zero respectively.
